title: Congresswoman Sheila Jackson Lee on Trade Policy
itunes:title: Congresswoman Sheila Jackson Lee on Trade Policy
description:
Kevin spoke with Douglas Holtz-Eakin, Former CBO Director, American Action Forum President, and Adam Hodge, Former DNC Communications Director. They discussed trade talks, Mnuchin's testimony, and infrastructure. 

Kevin also spoke with Congresswoman Sheila Jackson Lee about impeachment and trade policy. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
